name: Slash 'N' Dash
description:
=== Slash 'N' Dash === 

 Slash 'N' Dash is an arcade platformer that focuses on speed. Traverse through the city skyline of a world that is in demise, nothing is truly safe and nothing is sacred. Anything goes as the saying is. Try to survive through the night to see the morning sun one last time before we face the true enemy. 

 === Features ===

 Fast paced movement

 Old School Arcade Difficulty 

 Speed-Run Mode 

 Grapple Through The Air Like A True Ninja
